object_name.value: Validate Change Request has at least one attachment

title.value: Used to validate if the Change Request has at least one attachment.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
The Change Request isn't attached to any documents. Select the document(s) to be changed and attach them to the Change Request as child(s) prior to submitting it.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select r_object_id FROM cd_controlled_doc(deleted) WHERE r_object_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM dmr_containment WHERE parent_id = '$value(r_object_id)') AND r_object_id != '$value(i_chronicle_id)')
